name: Dashi Dash
description:
Controls :

Jump -> Jump

Dash -> Dash the player's forwards. | * Player needs to be in Mid-Air to Dash!*

Gaining points -> Dash through walls, the only way to dash is to jump beforehand.

Complete the game by gaining points

View my GitHub to see the full Game Flow Chart for better understanding of the game -> https://github.com/JorDindi/Dashi_Dash

No PC Support, Mobile only!
